response.overview: Elliot Richards, a socially awkward IT worker, is given seven wishes to get the girl of his dreams when he meets a very seductive Satan. The catch: his soul. Some of his wishes include being a 7 foot basketball star, a wealthy, powerful man, and a sensitive caring guy. But, as could be expected, the Devil puts her own little twist on each of his fantasies.
response.tagline: Meet the Devil. She's giving Elliott seven wishes. But not a chance in Hell.
response.title: Bedazzled
